entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -10.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Edson Airport 06:00 AM MST Wednesday 28 December 2022

Temperature: -10.3°C

Visibility: 4.8 km
Wind Chill: -13

Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 9. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries early this morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 9. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming clear near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Wednesday 28 December 2022
